channel.title: Server Help
channel.description: Im currently trying to make a server for my Little Brother, and i havin trouble doing so, ive gone through about 2-3 differant tuts. yet none have worked, closest ive gotten is loggin in and then getting connection lost....I'm requesting someone's help Via TeamViewer. if you can help please respond here. or message me via aim or skype. I'd appriciate it sooo much and give lots of credit if you get the server working. Basically all im asking is for someone to Literally Guide me through Creating a Server. -Thank you Aim: NoLannnnnnn (7 n's) Skype: iTzNoLannn

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @xchr0nicx xchr0nicx
item.description:
@xchr0nicx wrote:

Well agreed.

Quick thing - If you are going to be putting it up for all to play, you most likely will have to port forward, but try not doing it. I luckily did not have to do it, I ran a GTA SA multiplayer server and currently a RS server, and never had to port forward.

Try it, go to whatsmyip.org - tell your IP to someone, and have them try going onto your server, once you have opened the run file, and see if they can get on. If so, you can get like a ***.no-ip.org URL for server IP, or use your IP. If they cannot, you will need to port forward which is hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Ground_zero_317 Ground zero 317
item.description:
@Ground_zero_317 wrote:

[quote=“iTzNoLannn, post:1, topic:355901”]Im currently trying to make a server for my Little Brother, and i havin trouble doing so, ive gone through about 2-3 differant tuts. yet none have worked, closest ive gotten is loggin in and then getting connection lost…I’m requesting someone’s help Via TeamViewer. if you can help please respond here. or message me via aim or skype. I’d appriciate it sooo much and give lots of credit if you get the server working. Basically all im asking is for someone to Literally Guide me through Creating a Server.
-Thank you
Aim: NoLannnnnnn (7 n’s)
Skype: iTzNoLannn[/quote]

like what xchr0nicx said it is best off to download source and client but if you did and your dcing your probly need to download new java and jdk and then fix the class paths and if your on x64 you will have to change the class paths to fix that. Then make sure the ip is 127.0.0.1(local host) for you can log in and edit. Depends on your client is where you put the ip adress if you have gui you put in gui if you dont you put in client. Then if you want to get the server up online you will have to portforward the most hardest part of the private server (port forwarding is to allow a path to your computer for people can acess the private server witch will be open on that port). To be exact for people to help you figure out your problem is post the the link of the source your using and then make of a list of what all you did.

edit:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,411911.0.html Try that, It's what im using atm and it's a nice base.
that isnt a good server actually tbh in my opinion and alot of others thats a horrible source. Try using pi but it has few bugs but there is guides to fix it thats what im using. Atleast use delta i think its more better the only thing wrong with delta is combat triangle but delta has tons of guides.

Read full topic
